channel.title: [SOLVED] Looks in Character/Moreinfo files - Explained
channel.description:
Hi. I have recently decided to modify the way my server saves character information / server settings / etc. On My computer. I am currently making a new class which will load character information from a MySQL Database. The database is set up with test information, and so far the java works. My problem is, I've come to the [LOOKS] part in the /moreinfo/ files, and its really confusing. I was hoping to stop saving all unnessicery data, and Having 5 blocks all reading the same thing seems unnessicery to me. If someone knows, I would greatly appreciate them letting me know what the deal is with saving character looks.
Thanks, Ben Corbett AKA Unborn[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2007, 02:13:52 AM[/size][hr]Anyone know anything about how character looks are saved? :\

item.title: [SOLVED] Looks in Character/Moreinfo files - Explained
item.dc:creator: @bencorbett bencorbett
item.description:
@bencorbett wrote:

Thanks, but its not really what i was after…

After a while of studying my client.java, I found what each variable does:

• playerLook[0] - Gender
• playerLook[1] - Hair Colour
• playerLook[2] - Torso (Shirt) Colour
• playerLook[3] - Legs (Pants) Colour
• playerLook[4] - Shoe Colour
• playerLook[5] - SKin Colour

• pHead - Head Style
• pBeard - Jaw Style
• pTorso - Torso Style
• pArms - Arm Style
• pHands - Hands Style
• pLegs - Legs Style
• pFeet - Feet Style

I know how, but I still don’t know why the pHead, pBeard stuff is repeated in my moreinfo files though. =\

Read full topic

Hi.
I have recently decided to modify the way my server saves character information / server settings / etc. On My computer.
